title: Roses
lyrics:
Somebody's into roses now
What do you do with them?
You've got no reason to trade them
No nice ways to throw them
But it doesn't seem right
To throw them away

Yet you can't very well

Send them back the other way

You always try to be nice

But is it really the right way

I see you smile, the way you smile



Now I know you really do care and you mean no harm

When people look, their reflections everywhere and

Everyone

Some like a soft glow, some a little sharper depiction

You always trying to be, with the ones you want to see

It's not really up to them, what they see



Somebody's into roses now

What do you do with them?

You've got no reason to trade them

No nice ways to throw them

But it doesn't seem right

To throw them away

Yet you can't very well

Send them back the other way

You always try to be nice

But is it really the right way

I see you smile, the way you smile



Now I know you really do care and you mean no harm

When people look, their reflections everywhere and

Everyone

Some like a soft glow, some a little sharper depiction

You always trying to be, with the ones you want to see

It's not really up to them, what they see



Whatever you see

Whatever you see, it's okay by me

Whatever you see

Whatever you see, it's okay by me

Whatever you see

Whatever you see, it's okay, it's alright by me
